title: My parents hate league
body: Help me. My parents don't like me playing lol because you can't leave games, the player base swears a lot, and it's addictive qualities. Any advice on how to get them to not hate it would be appreciated.

replies.body:
sounds like your parents have good taste in video games and you don't.
how sad is that.

At least your parents don't hate video games in general. For me I had to play games secretly throughout all my teenagehood because my parents despise all video games regardless of forms or any content, they also never negotiate on anything.

.............

In your case, you could always arrange game times/schedules so that the "you can't leave" isn't so much of a problem. 

However that said, your parents' concern on the game's usually toxic playerbase and addictive qualities really ain't wrong, you can't deny that. But if you still wanna play League you could also convince them that:

1) You ain't toxic.
2) You can cope with toxic.
3) You aren't addicted. You just like League that's all.

If you can prove these 3 points I'm sure your parents wouldn't be supervising you too much, given that your parents are understanding.

And it's not like League is the only game, there are many MANY more out there. If your parents aren't just hating on games as a whole, there are a lot of workable solutions and alternatives you know; such as switching to singleplayer games for one already solves all of the concerns your parents raised, as well as switching to games with more laxed community (most games outside of MOBA, sports games and massively popular FPS like CoD tend to have chiller community). Just foods for thoughts.
Yeah... they don't like video but but particularly hate lol =(
Actually this. Do this if you need OP, best advice anyone here will give.

if you need to leave mid game then why do you even play?

swear words are just words. you probably have asian parents i expect but surely they would understand if you explained it to them.

league has additive qualities? tbh the only 'addiction' is playing enough to fill out 2 rune pages.
Your parents are right, just don't play so much league and do something else. It's just the same repetitive shit every game if you think about it.
Or you could just listen to your parents? All 3 of those points are pretty valid excuses

Simple, you dont.

They arent wrong about any of the things you just listed.
